lines.text: Would you call yourself a "Champagne cocktail-sippin', cock-teasin', downtown barroom whore"?
You are so dumb you make me sick, whitey.

[fondly]
Well I'm getting kinda fond of you too, spook.
Let me give you one piece of advice, one old salt to another... Ah, to hell with advice.
Why is it everybody else gets chicken and I always get the feathers?
Love is shit with sugar on it.
